page.title: 12School population survey
page.content: Aschool survey was completed in June 1984 showing the number in full time education from three years old to the end of their primary school education at eleven years old.The results were:- {SCHOOL NURSERY INFANT JUNIOR T0T. Elliot Town 36 46 71 153 Cwmsyfiog 26 54 40 120 Pillipstown 29 51 101 181 Brithdir 11 15 28 54 Tirphil 9 16 27 52 Deri 8 23 48 79 { TOTAL 639} With a fall in the birthrate during the late 1960'S and early 1970'S, school populations have dropped dramatically. In 1971 the populations for the same schools' were 1267, and at that time children entered school at the age of five years old.
